title: How to Get the Arms Dealer in Terraria

steps.title: Find Ammo for a gun.
steps.content: Find Ammo for a gun. You can rarely find these in chests scattered around the world.

steps.title: Once you find Ammo for a gun, keep it in your inventory.
steps.content: Once you find Ammo for a gun, keep it in your inventory. Then, wait patiently till the Arms Dealer shows up!

steps.title: This method is easier, since it's less difficult to find a Gun than it is to find Ammo by itself.
steps.content: This method is easier, since it's less difficult to find a Gun than it is to find Ammo by itself.

steps.title: Explore the Corruption.
steps.content: Explore the Corruption. Go deep underground until you find a Shadow Orb. A Musket will most likely drop out, allowing you to get the Arms Dealer.

steps.title: Explore the Crimson.
steps.content: Explore the Crimson. There's a 100% chance of The Undertaker (a kind of pistol) dropping out of every first Crimson Heart you destroy.

steps.title: Defeat Skeletron
steps.content: Defeat Skeletron . Then, explore the Dungeon until you find the Handgun. The Handgun is slightly more difficult to obtain than the two guns mentioned above.

steps.title: Get the Phoenix Blaster
steps.content: Get the Phoenix Blaster . The Phoenix Blaster is obtained by combining the Handgun and a few Hellstone bars at the Iron/Lead anvil.

steps.title: Kill Golem in the Lizard Temple.
steps.content: Kill Golem in the Lizard Temple. There's a 20% chance that he'll drop the Stinger.

steps.title: Once you get one of the guns mentioned above (or any unmentioned guns that fire bullets), the Arms Dealer will appear!
steps.content: Once you get one of the guns mentioned above (or any unmentioned guns that fire bullets), the Arms Dealer will appear!
